txt.en: Talk to Narthrien in Parth Rest

'Mae govannen. Recently, the lumber supply from Ethring has ceased. This has put a strain on our supplies for the rebuilding of Barad Rill, but nature provides! \n\n'The rivers that run from Ringlo Vale may have salvageable driftwood. Could you see if you can find anything worth keeping?'
You have collected a healthy amount of driftwood that could be of use as lumber in Parth Rest. You should bring it back to Narthrien.\n\nNarthrien can be found in Parth Rest.
Narthrien may have a solution to Parth Rest's supply chain issue.
Talk to Narthrien in Parth Rest
Narthrien suggests you collect driftwood that is dry enough to be salvageable.

'We must make use of what nature provides, [placeholder]. This includes all the resources that are scattered due to the war.\n\n'This driftwood should be valuable as lumber while we wait for supplies to come back from Ethring.'
